thread.title: LeBron James channeled his NBA Finals form in getting a chasedown block on Courtney Lee
thread.title_full: LeBron James channeled his NBA Finals form in getting a chasedown block on Courtney Lee

author: Molly Podlesny
title: LeBron James channeled his NBA Finals form in getting a chasedown block on Courtney Lee
text:
Nice try, Knicks.
As the Cavs took on the Knicks Thursday night, LeBron James had a little mishap, in which he botched a pass to Kyle Korver.
Courtney Lee quickly took advantage, bringing the ball all the way back down the court. Luckily, LeBron’s alter ego took over.
LEBLOCK TO THE RESCUEEEE.

Let’s get a closer look.
DENIED.
Nice work, LeBron and LeBlock.
